name: I want to go home (broken)
description:
Warning: This game is broken. For some reason once the build was completed a lot of the game functionality broke. :(  We will probably look at fixing the final build soon.

Github: https://github.com/JemWritesCode/BrackeyJam2022

This is our submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2! The theme of the jam was "you're not alone". So we decided to make a game about an introvert who would really rather be at home alone.

Instructions:

WASD to move, shift to run

When the conversation battle pops up it is a rhythm game. You have to press the corresponding WASD key when the emoji is over the square

Team:

JemWritesCode

Redseiko
